Class: Lemonette.NotificationsModule

Defined in: app/scripts/application/notifications/notifications_module.coffee
Inherits: Lemonette.Module

Overview

This module contains helpers to show notifications Requires: * Toastr

See also:

  • Toastr

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) showAlert(options) Private Show an alert toast.
  • # (void) showInfo(options) Private Show an info toast.
  • # (void) Toast(type, css, title, message) Private Create new Object to show in Toastr
  • # (void) showMessage(options = {}) Private Show a Toastr with options to a button inside toastr [.toast .action]
  • # (void) addInitializer() Register commadnds for acces to show alert and show info through Application

Inherited Method Summary

Methods inherited from Lemonette.Module

#initialize

Instance Method Details

# (void) showAlert(options) Private

Show an alert toast. Used for errors and warnings

  • This method is accessible via command: App.execute('alert.show')

Examples:

'alert.show', {title: 'No autorizado', message: JSON.parse(jqXHR.responseText).message}) if jqXHR.status > 400

Parameters:

  • options ( Object )

Options Hash: (options):

  • type ( String ) — default: warning can be: error warning
  • title ( String ) — of message
  • message ( String )
  • success ( Function ) — callback

# (void) showInfo(options) Private

Show an info toast. Used for success or information feedback

  • This method is accessible via command: App.execute('info.show')

Parameters:

  • options ( Object )

Options Hash: (options):

  • type ( String ) — default: info can be: success info
  • title ( String ) — of message
  • message ( String )
  • success ( Function ) — callback

# (void) Toast(type, css, title, message) Private

Create new Object to show in Toastr

# (void) showMessage(options = {}) Private

Show a Toastr with options to a button inside toastr [.toast .action]

Parameters:

  • options ( Object )

Options Hash: (options):

  • type ( String ) — [warning, error, info, success]
  • title ( String ) — of message
  • message ( String )
  • timeOut ( Integer ) — automatically close at timeOut milliseconds
  • showMethod ( String ) — [slideDonw, slideUp, FadeIn, etc]
  • hideMethod ( String ) — [slideDonw, slideUp, FadeIn, etc]
  • css ( String ) — option for type ex: 'toast-top-full-width'
  • wherever ( Function ) — callback, you need add data-callback=name

See also:

  • https://github.com/CodeSeven/toastr
